ygData.subject: Re: Research
ygData.msgSnippet: From what I ve gathered the research skill is for things like evocation , conjuration , diviniation , etc... Logically, it would be for spell research, and
ygData.messageBody:
From what I've gathered the research skill is for things like "evocation",
"conjuration", "diviniation", etc...
Logically, it would be for spell research, and I'm assuming that there'll be
ways to obtain new spells through this. If it were me that was designing it,
then we'd need spell components and such. Otherwise, why sell blank scroll
sheets, and quills, and ink??

Zalbar
14th Wizard
Solusek Ro
-----Original Message-----
From: robert.dodd@... <robert.dodd@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: 20 avril, 1999 17:16
Subject: [eq_wizards] Research


>From: robert.dodd@...
>
>What good does the research skill have? I've heard that I could research
>spells myself instead of buying them, but that it would cost more than
>simply purchasing the spell. Are there spells that can only be found by
>research? (I'm assuming this is the case...) Does anyone have any insights
>that they could share? Thanks...
>
>Robert Dodd
>Malatar, 16th level wizard on Rathe
